summary: Natalie is a college graduate visiting her hometown over the 4th of July. The night she arrives, she is stalked by a sociopathic killer.
cast: Krista Dzialoszynski|David O'Brien|Mary Mikva|Keenan Camp|Nikki Taguilas-Pierce|Eric Wood|Katie Johnston-Smith|Tony Rossi|Jonathan Pitts|Bryan Arteberry|Johnny Barnas|Allan Carlson|Amber Entas|Molly Fenton|Ethan Freeman|Donna Gloria|Kyle Gloria|Dustin Hale|Beau Howes|Tommy Johnston|Mike Maggio|Chris O'Brien|Colton Peterson|Tucker Schoff|Jared Strader|Tom Ptasnik
title: You Are Not Alone
